name: Anglership
description:
Anglership

Play as an underwater explorer that tries to find mysterious artefacts lost in the depths of the sea.

This work is a submission for the Black and White Jam. The game only uses 2 colours: black or white.

Credits
  • Daniela Machado (CryptiCat)
  • Diogo Rato (Ratuspro)
  • João Lopes (Draike)
  • Manuel Guimarães (TheDarkRyze)
  • Manuel Menezes (SpaceShoe)

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
